My speakers are fine.  That's actually how I noticed that this was a bad rip.  Listening to it on my PC sounded "okay", but as soon as I listened to it in my car or on my head phones I noticed that your upload suffered the same problem as the others that I've tried.  No high end on most of the songs and just a bland sound altogether.

I did find a nice CD quality rip on here though.

No offense to you though.
